languages.text: "Скажи, Вени'Кассия. Ты... правда видишь свет Неумирающего во тьме меж звезд? Каков он?"
"Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"
languages.original_text: "Скажи, Вени'Кассия. Ты... правда видишь свет Неумирающего во тьме меж звезд? Каков он?"

traits.locale_text: "Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"
"Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"
"Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"

"Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"

languages.text: "Sagt mir etwas, Veni'Cassia. Seht Ihr ... wirklich das Licht des Todlosen in der Dunkelheit zwischen den Sternen? Wie ist das?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"

traits.locale_text: "Sagt mir etwas, Veni'Cassia. Seht Ihr ... wirklich das Licht des Todlosen in der Dunkelheit zwischen den Sternen? Wie ist das?"

languages.text: « Dites-moi, Veni'Cassia... Vous... vous percevez vraiment la lumière de l'Immortel dans les ténèbres intersidérales ? Comment se manifeste-t-elle ? »
languages.original_text: "Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"

traits.locale_text: « Dites-moi, Veni'Cassia... Vous... vous percevez vraiment la lumière de l'Immortel dans les ténèbres intersidérales ? Comment se manifeste-t-elle ? »

languages.text: «Dígame, Veni'Cassia, ¿es... cierto que ve la luz del Inmortal en la oscuridad entre las estrellas? ¿Cómo es?».
languages.original_text: "Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"

traits.locale_text: «Dígame, Veni'Cassia, ¿es... cierto que ve la luz del Inmortal en la oscuridad entre las estrellas? ¿Cómo es?».

languages.text: 「教えてください、カシア。あなたは…星の間に、暗闇の中で、本当に不死の者の光を見つけることができるのですか？それはどんな光なのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"

traits.locale_text: 「教えてください、カシア。あなたは…星の間に、暗闇の中で、本当に不死の者の光を見つけることができるのですか？それはどんな光なのですか？」

languages.text: “告诉我，帷者卡西娅，你真的能……在群星之间的黑暗中，看到不死之神真正的光芒吗？它是什么样子的？”
languages.original_text: "Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"

traits.locale_text: “告诉我，帷者卡西娅，你真的能……在群星之间的黑暗中，看到不死之神真正的光芒吗？它是什么样子的？”

languages.original_text: "Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"

languages.text: "Merak ettiğim bir şey var Veni'Cassia. Yıldızların arasındaki karanlıkta... Ölmeyen'ın ışığını hakikaten görüyor musun? Nasıl bir şey?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me something, Veni'Cassia. Do you... truly see the Undying One's light in the darkness between the stars? What is it like?"
